The '''Peculiar Pinion''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|Seirai Stormchasers: Part IV}}.

During the {{Quest|Octave of the Maushiro}} it is automatically exchanged for the usable Gadget version: [[Peculiar Pinion]].
